frame.name: Reciprocality_subordinate_event
frame.definition: <def-root>Perspective of Reciprocality in which <fen>Protagonist_2</fen> acts on or is related to <fen>Protagonist_1</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Protagonist_1
FE.definition:
<def-root>The particpant in a reciprocal event that is encoded as the subject of an active-form sentence or as a by-PP in a passive.
<ex>'<fex name="Protagonist_1">You</fex> can't <t>argue</t> politics with foreigners,' sighed the policeman.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Protagonist_2
FE.definition: <def-root>The participant in a reciprocal event that is coded in a with-PP. <ex>We have been <t>arguing</t> the point <fex name="Protagonist_2">with the inspector at claims branch</fex> for many many months and we just seem to go round in circles.</ex></def-root>
